url.description: Streamed request URL, for historical purposes, in case the contentItem.contentUrl changes at any point.

duration.description: Proxy streaming duration of the content, in milliseconds.

bytesTransferred.description: Number of actual bytes transferred in the response stream. Should match contentLength if no errors.

contentLength.description: Derived from content-length HTTP header, if present

acceptRanges.description: Derived from accept-ranges HTTP header, if present. RFC7233 defines only 'bytes' and 'none' as valid values.

rangeStart.description: If the request included a range header, this is the start of the range served, derived from content-range HTTP header

rangeEnd.description: If the request included a range header, this is the end of the range served, derived from content-range HTTP header

totalSize.description: Total size of the content in bytes, if known, derived from content-range HTTP header

contentType.description: Derived from content-type HTTP header, if present. Defaults to application/octet-stream if not present.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the response
